org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.representation
Class HTMLStringBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.representation.HTMLStringBuilder

public class HTMLStringBuilder
extends Object

Class to handle the low level details of HTML to build the page from the model

Author:
Mathias Mueller mathias.mueller(at)unifr.ch, Dominique Guinard
